name: Ninja Bros (Nyophon)
description:
Ninja Bros is a simple 2D top-down shooter. However, you play as not just one, but two characters. Whenever you throw a shuriken as one of the ninjas, you will switch to the other ninja.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 and is my first attempt at a game jam. I am still mostly a beginner, but I'm trying my best to work towards being a professional game dev in the future. Feel free to give any level of criticism. Any feedback is appreciated.
